title: I got lower queue for the most stupid reason ever
body: Ok. So i was in the waiting screen waiting for over 5 minutes waiting for a player to connect because that player wasnt connected. The game didn't start for so long so i was curious then i found out i was the one who was disconnected but i was stuck in loading screen. then when i tried to reconnect back to my game i got into the game and bought my items then my team voted for a remake.  how is that possible, i reconnected before the voted but it still went through and now im on lower queue. its really annoying.

replies.body:
The [/Remake System](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) will mark any player who is *inactive* for 90 or more seconds within the first 3 minutes of the game. If a player has been marked, a vote will be held at 3:00 gametime and requires 30% of the team to vote yes for it to pass.

It sounds like you experienced troubled connecting to the gameserver itself, so I recommend going through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if this resolved your issues.
ok. So I install the HRT and have the LoL Log is there anything else I'm supposed to do?
The connection guide doesn't reference the HRT. Can you work through all the steps in the guide I linked above?
so i even  tried to reinstall the game but it still it still say "attempting to reconnect" over and over through a game.  How do i fix this?
